title: Evolution Of Physique?
body:
Evolution Of Physique?

Clang! Clang! - - -

The sound of metal clashing against metal rang out in the vast outer space as the stars and galaxies illuminated the surroundings in myriad colours.

Brzzz!!!

A sword, nearly one and a half meters long buzzed as it released powerful sword energies in all directions, disintegrating all the asteroids or dead planets that came into contact with the power that it was releasing.

"You fu*king monster... Just what kind of abomination weapon is that?" A girl, who looked around thirteen or fourteen years old said in a hateful voice as she slashed ahead of her using the long silver sword that was slightly larger than her petty body.

As the girl slashed with her sword, a storm of icy sword energy that froze thousands of kilometres of outer space rushed ahead, turning everything that came in its path into icy dust.
